body.p: If the Monitor fails to transfer the load, the SAS board will take over the transfer. If Alarms appear showing the SAS board in control, follow these steps:

li.p: Check the Alarms page for alarms showing the SAS board is in control.
Login on the Home page as Administrator or other higher level authorization.
Touch the Reset button on the Alarms page to clear alarms. (Alarms will remain listed in the Event Log.)
Check that SAS board alarms clear and do not reappear.
If SAS board alarms reappear, contact Eaton Service (1-800-843-9433).
